description: Ohio Attorney General To Ohioans who may be interested in being a foster parent, I ask you to make that leap and open your home to a kid or kids who could use a stable, loving home.  Right now there is a growing chasm between the number of available foster families and the increasing number of children who enter the child welfare system because one or both of their parents are drug addicts. Please watch this short video to learn more about the problem and about why one foster mom chose to get involved. Then, visit  www.ohioattorneygeneral.gov/FosterFamilies  to learn more about how you can become a foster parent in Ohio. Allen Willow Performing Arts Academy Becky Sprague

description: Mimi B Photography  is with  Kaitlyn Scott . The dog had been neglected. Aged and broken. Forgotten and all-but-abandoned. But her suffering had not gone unnoticed. This girl came to her rescue ... a student with no money, yet overflowing with love, compassion and determination. She scooped her up, started a Go Fund Me account to cover the dog's many medical expenses, and then--serendipitously--met a Veterinarian who just happened to specialize in the surgery that the dog needed. A special bond was formed. A second chance was given.  I believe that no good deed goes unnoticed, and that every kindness toward another creature is cause for a loving smile from our creator.   <3

description: Mimi B Photography  is with  Kaitlyn Scott . The dog had been neglected. Aged and broken. Forgotten and all-but-abandoned. But her suffering had not gone unnoticed. This girl came to her rescue ... a student with no money, yet overflowing with love, compassion and determination. She scooped her up, started a Go Fund Me account to cover the dog's many medical expenses, and then--serendipitously--met a Veterinarian who just happened to specialize in the surgery that the dog needed. A special bond was formed. A second chance was given.  I believe that no good deed goes unnoticed, and that every kindness toward another creature is cause for a loving smile from our creator.   <3

Mary Brown Szymkowiak  shared a memory. Love these two  ❤️ Mary Brown Szymkowiak  added  3 new photos .  ·  November 5, 2015  ·  They lead a quiet, but powerful life ... living under the radar like the Superheroes they are.  She visits local Amish families every week at their homes, buyin ... g their produce & bread ... to help support their families in that depressed county. He gets up early for his BFN (Bible Fellowship Network), a small group of amateur radio enthusiasts across the nation who have been praying for my family (among others) lately. Then he heads to the local elementary to tutor "his" kids ... who struggled with reading before he made it fun. She'll prepare a meal for us and drive 2 hours out of their way to deliver it. Their farm is a haven. A place where deer peek from the woods, a stream babbles at the bottom of our sledding hill, the old Farmall rests in the barn and where he waits for his barn swallows to return every spring. No such thing as an ordinary day for them. Or with them in my life.  # 30DaysOfGratitude   # Day4   See More

description: Mary Brown Szymkowiak  shared a memory. Our sweet girl (and my napping buddy)  ❤️ Mary Brown Szymkowiak  ·  November 6, 2015  ·  "We couldn't have picked a better dog," he says frequently. Truth is, I think she picked us. She just jumped up in his lap at the pet store, batted her long eye ... lashes and suddenly she was on the way home with us. She takes her job as Neighborhood Squirrel Patrol VERY seriously, stalking like a cat. When we walk her, people often drive by... slow down...and smile after one look at her short legs, red coat, and solid body. [Or maybe they're noting the similarities between us girls? Hmmm.] We've learned to speak Corgi around here ... recognizing the focused, in-your-face-stare that means "time for my outdoor rounds." Or the side look that means, "Get ready. It's time to engage in some Kamikaze Corgi play."  She's my loud, obstinate, camera shy, brown-eyed girl. And I look forward to spending time with her every day  :)   # 30DaysofGratitude   # Day5   See More
